thread.title: Sri Lanka Holds Interest Rates For Third Straight Month
thread.title_full: Sri Lanka Holds Interest Rates For Third Straight Month - Bloomberg Business

author: Anusha Ondaatjie
title: Sri Lanka Holds Interest Rates For Third Straight Month
text:
The Central Bank of Sri Lanka kept its interest rates unchanged and said near-record-low inflation is likely to continue for the next few months.
Governor Arjuna Mahendran left the standing lending facility rate at 7.5 percent and standing deposit facility rate at 6 percent, as predicted by all five economists in a Bloomberg survey.
Consumer prices rose 0.1 percent in June from a year earlier, matching the slowest pace in data going back to January 2009.
